title: New Orleans-Style Olive Salad Recipe
full_text:
New Orleans-Style Olive Salad Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
6
to 8 servings
Makes
1 1/2 cups
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
3/4
cup
pitted mixed oil-packed olives
1
tablespoon
capers
1/4
cup
chopped roasted red peppers
2
tablespoons
parsley leaves
1/2
cup
giardiniera
(Italian-style pickled vegetable salad)
1
medium clove
garlic
, minced (about
1
teaspoon
)
1
tablespoon
red wine vinegar
3
tablespoons
extra-virgin olive oil
Directions
Combine olives, capers, peppers, parsley, giardiniera, and garlic in the bowl of a food processor. Pulse to chop until no pieces larger than 1/2-inch remain. Alternatively, chop by hand. Transfer to a bowl. Add vinegar and olive oil and stir to combine. For best results, let olive salad rest overnight before using.
